resources.string:
PWM Android SDK extension example application 

 This application serves as a reference implementation of Kynetics' PWM Android SDK Extension library. 


To learn more about SDK Extension licensing please visit:
 https://www.kynetics.com/android-sdk-extensions


Application source code is available under Apache v2.0 licence at:
 https://github.com/Kynetics/android-pwm-example-app
